trainingCategories.title: Secure Info-Tech Solutions (SITS)
trainingCategories.description: Customized training on specific Software for the corporate needs.
Experienced Technical Professional-Advanced program where professional are taught specific Software Tools and New Technology needed for Career Advancement
Experienced Non-Technical Professionals-13 to 14 weeks program where professionals are taught and trained in the following areas:
topics: Structured Query Language (SQL) / UNIX / XML, HTML
Object Oriented Concepts: JAVA, RUBY, C++
Automation: Selenium Webdriver, TestNG, Selenium Grid, SOAP UI
Life Cycle Management Tool: HP ALM, SharePoint
Change Management Software: JIRA, SVN, VSS, Quality Center
Database: Oracle, SQL Server, Sybase and MS Access
Database Development Tool: SQL Plus, SQL Developer and TOAD
Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) / Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC)
BI Tool: Business Object and OBIEE
